DOC.brief_summary: This open label observational pharmacokinetic drug study evaluate Levofloxacine Capreomycin patient Multidrug-Resistant Tuberculosis ( MDR-TB ) .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Levofloxacin Capreomycin Multidrug-Resistant Tuberculosis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Patients receive MDR-TB treatment o.a . Levofloxacin Capreomycin . At least one week start treatment , PK sample sample obtain via intravenous catheter 0 , 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 7 , 12 hour intake .
DOC.criteria: age > 18yrs culture positive diagnosis MDRTB DM2 Pregnancy allergy IV canula material insertion IV canula possibele
